an9.64:1: "Bhikkhus, there are these five hindrances. What five? The hindrance of sensual desire, the hindrance of ill will, the hindrance of dullnessand drowsiness, the hindrance of restlessness and remorse, and the hindrance of doubt.
an9.64:2: These are the five hindrances â€¦. These four establishments of mindfulness are to be developed for abandoning these five hindrances."
